videos.headline: UConn QB throws INT off a helmet, leading to big-man TD
videos.description: Holy Cross defensive lineman Jason Modak runs back a 29-yard pick-six off a disastrous throw by UConn QB Jack Zergiotis.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (UConn QB throws INT off a helmet, leading to big-man TD) 2021/09/04 ESHEET
